Ukraine says it hits airfield in Russia-occupied CrimeaThe Ukrainian military claimed on Wednesday to have struck a military air base in Russian-occupied Crimea, while Moscow said it had thwarted the attack by shooting down missiles but some debris had hit a military installation. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:55:20 GMT NX7ZKRHVNFKCFL3G6YHMVXO6V4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-it-hits-airfield-Russia-占领-crimea-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
US charges Chinese nationals with smuggling US-made electronics to IranU.S. authorities have charged four Chinese nationals with crimes related to the smuggling of U.S.-made electronic components, including some with possible military use, to Iran, the Justice Department said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:41:30 GMT Q656PTG7FRI7XAHSWJW5FYVSJU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-charges-chinese-nationals-with-smuggling-us-made- electronics-iran-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
Ukraine mobilisation bill - what does it propose?Ukraine's government has submitted an amended draft bill that would tighten the rules on army mobilisation for debate in parliament. The bill, if passed, would allow Kyiv to call up more people and tighten punishments for draft dodging. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:35:47 GMT 7WL6FKRJFNM4RIMIYFEBEV5MJE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/embattled-ukraine-moves-tighten-army-mobilization-rules-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
Swiss ban Russian diamond imports, joining latest EU sanctionsSwitzerland will ban the import of Russian diamonds in line with the latest round of European Union sanctions designed to punish Moscow for its invasion of Ukraine, the government said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:31:34 GMT LIPVDVFME5JDHLVRNU7E5RTPD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/swiss-ban- Russian-diamond-imports-joining-latest-eu-sanctions-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
Not happily ever after? Cyprus police probe 133 'fake' weddingsLaw enforcement agencies in Cyprus, Latvia and Portugal have made 15 arrests involving dozens of alleged marriages of convenience on the eastern Mediterranean island, police in Cyprus said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:28:57 GMT ZO6DLIQC3FINNHOKCD4723F2HI https://www.reuters.com/world/not-happily-ever-after-cyprus-police-probe-133-fake-weddings-2024-01-31/Reuters世界
Mexican president denies drug cartel financing in first campaignMexico's president rejected allegations on Wednesday that his first presidential campaign nearly two decades ago received financing from drug cartel leaders in exchange for future help with their criminal operations from his would-be government. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:26:11 GMT F2ZHQLOZCBJQZPXGY3F66HCGFU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-president-denies-drug-cartel-financing-first-campaign-2024-01-31/Raul Cortes Fernandez世界美洲
Argentina's Milei seeks omnibus bill backing as opposition warns 'chainsaw' startingThe government of Argentine libertarian President Javier Milei was racing to secure votes in Congress for its key 'omnibus' reform bill that entered the lower of chamber on Wednesday, even as the left-leaning opposition pledged to oppose it. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:21:27 GMT MTGTRE3YNFKPJNST4IMPMFA5LY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentinas-milei-seeks-omnibus-bill-backing-opposition-warns-chainsaw-starting-2024-01-31/Walter Bianchi世界美洲
Yellen tells EU that Biden is committed to Ukraine budget fundingU.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen reassured top European Union officials on Wednesday that the Biden administration was "firmly committed" to its request for Congress to approve $11.8 billion in budget aid for Ukraine, saying failure to do so would hand a victory to Russian President Vladimir Putin. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:17:49 GMT FJRSHQA2AVNENKPCXQV3R3GKG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/yellen-tells-eu-that-biden-is-comfilled-ukraine-budget-funding-2024-01-31/David Lawder世界欧洲
EU grapples with future of military aid for UkraineA standoff between Germany and other European Union countries has cast uncertainty on the future of an EU military aid fund that has bankrolled billions of euros in arms for Ukraine. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:15:59 GMT ZAZHXZSQFFKF5DQVPXNRF4JYJU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-grapples-with-future-military-aid-ukraine-2024-01-31/Andrew Gray世界欧洲
Gaza's economy could take decades to recover, UN trade body saysIt could take until the closing years of the century for Gaza's economy to regain its pre-conflict size if hostilities in the Palestinian enclave were to cease immediately, the U.N. trade body said in a report published on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:06:10 GMT N63HOKPFL5OHDH7U64IXALILKU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gazas-economy-could-take-decades-recover-un-trade-body-says-2024-01-31/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber, Cecile Mantovani世界中东
Germany's former top neo-Nazi hunter now being monitored as extremistHans-Georg Maassen, who until five years ago was responsible for protecting Germany against violent and extremist threats to its democracy, is himself now being monitored by the security agency he ran, the bureaucrat-turned-politician said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 16:42:19 GMT KSCVJFTR6ZPKZJPK3DGZMO7FHM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germanys-former-top-neo-nazi-hunter-now-being-monitored-extremist-2024-01-31/Thomas Escritt世界欧洲
